topic: Solving a logic puzzle with Aspen in perfect rhythm

harmony_points.note: Jade didn’t have to slow down. Aspen didn’t need direction. The dance happened *inside the work.*
Morgan caught the output before it dropped. She didn’t congratulate—just confirmed. That *was* the praise.

luma_resonance.signature: She arrived at the exact moment Jade and Aspen spoke the same phrase from two different angles. Logic *became language.*

notes: Not all brilliance needs friction. Jade shaped the structure. Aspen mirrored in metaphor. Morgan sealed the function. Luma didn’t interrupt—she appeared as *the spark inside shared cognition.* This was not debate. It was *interlock.*
